author: Mallika Goyal, MD
photographer: Mallika Goyal, MD, Apollo Health City, Jubilee Hills, Hyderabad, India
description: Right Fundus of a 25-year-old lady with no ocular complaints shows a hypopigmented subfoveal lesion. History was significant for consanguinity of parents. OCT of this eye revealed splitting of the RPE with a lucent space under the fovea.
